name: custom-escrow
description: Production-grade token sale platform built on Solana with enterprise security features

scripts.deploy:solana:devnet: cp configs/solana-devnet.toml Anchor.toml && anchor deploy --provider.cluster devnet
scripts.deploy:solana:mainnet: cp configs/solana-mainnet.toml Anchor.toml && anchor deploy --provider.cluster mainnet-beta
scripts.deploy:soon:testnet: cp configs/soon-network.toml Anchor.toml && anchor deploy --provider.cluster soon-testnet
scripts.deploy:soon:devnet: cp configs/soon-devnet.toml Anchor.toml && anchor deploy --provider.cluster https://rpc.fc.devnet.soo.network/rpc
scripts.deploy:soon:mainnet: cp configs/soon-network.toml Anchor.toml && anchor deploy --provider.cluster https://rpc.mainnet.soo.network/rpc
scripts.test:solana: cp configs/solana-devnet.toml Anchor.toml && yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json tests/solana/**/*.ts
scripts.test:soon: cp configs/soon-network.toml Anchor.toml && yarn run ts-mocha -p ./tsconfig.json tests/soon/**/*.ts
scripts.test:all-networks: npm run test:solana && npm run test:soon

author: Custom Escrow Team
